item.title: Providers: Joining as a Federated Resource Provider - Resource Centre
item.description: A Resource Centre (RC) is the smallest resource administration domain in the EGI Federation. It can be either localised or geographically distributed and provides a minimum set of local or remote IT Services compliant with well-defined IT Capabilities (HTC, Cloud, Storage, etc.) necessary to make resources accessible to Users. EGI is a Resource Infrastructure federating RCs to constitute a homogeneous operational domain.
